Service Details: Offers public awareness and educational programs and award programs for environmental leaders and projects- Earth Day Every Day:  campaign to provide Canadians with information and tools to reduce carbon footprint- EcoKids -- educational website for teachers and students in grades K-8 * curriculum -based materials, activities and games - Beyond Green:  provides young adults 18-30 years with opportunities for direct environmental engagement - Tapestry Program:  works with non-profits to diversify environmental sector boards * leadership development *capacity building workshops and toolkits * speakers bureau- Employee Engagement Program:  fee-for-services * customized programs to help businesses meet their environmental, sustainability and conservation goals - Hometown Heroes Award Program:  recognizing individuals, non-profits and small businesses for environmental achievement
